info.title: Swing Ball
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.description: you are a ball that swings
info.details:
Swing Ball is a time based platformer with the ability to swing from almost anything.

Controls:
Nunchuck analog stick = move
A button = Jump (hold to jump higher)
B button = swing

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
thatotherdev.wordpress.com

Tunnel Rush background music by ara
ccmixter.org/people/ara

hit_on_wood sound effects by Anton
